title: Dr. Brown's Reusable Sponge Baby Bottle Cleaning Brush Set with Suction Cup Stand, Scrubber and Nipple Cleaner, Blue, 3 Count (Pack of 1)
description: For use with all standard and wide-neck Dr. Brown's natural flow baby bottles, this Dr. Brown's natural flow bottle brush features a grooved, no-slip handle and a combination sponge and bristle brush head for thorough, easy cleaning of bottles. At the base of the bottle brush are fixed chevron channels, designed specifically to clean nipples with ease. A storage clip is included so you can house the brush near the sink.
